professional_summary: Highly skilled Oracle Database Administrator with 8+ years of experience in managing and optimizing enterprise-level databases. Proficient in database design, performance tuning, backup/restore processes, and compliance management. Expertise in Oracle Cloud Infrastructure, automation scripting, and cross-platform database administration.

key_responsibilities: Administering and managing Oracle databases across multiple cloud platforms.
Performing database performance tuning and optimization to enhance system efficiency.
Implementing and maintaining backup and recovery solutions for critical applications.
and maintaining Oracle databases to meet business requirements.
Datapump for data migration and replication.
Performing regular database maintenance activities such as schema optimization and index management.
